meanings.definition: Onychophorans: a type of invertebrate animal with a soft body and many legs
meanings.sent1: The onychophorans crawled slowly across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of onychophorans in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The onychophorans had a race to see who could reach the leaf first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tiny creatures, onychophorans are the graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the colorful onychophorans they found in the garden.

meanings.definition: Onychophorans: relating to or characteristic of onychophorans
meanings.sent1: The onychophorans habitat must be kept moist for their survival.
meanings.sent2: The onychophorans exhibit unique mating behaviors during the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: It was a fashion trend to wear onychophorans-inspired jewelry.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as an onychophorans gliding through the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The onychophorans markings were so distinct that they could be easily identified.
